name: Rocket Soccer
description:
Controlls:

Keyboard Layout 1:

  • Forward: w
  • Bachwards: s
  • Left: a
  • Right: d
  • Boost: space
  • Handbrake: ctrl left

Keyboard Layout 2:

  • Forward: arrow up
  • Bachwards: arrow down
  • Left: arrow left
  • Right: arrow right
  • Boost: Numpad 0
  • Handbrake: ctrl right
